help_title: If you're in crisis, please reach out:
about_text:
This website was created in response to the growing number of people struggling with long-term sadness and inner dissatisfaction. Our goal is to provide a simple and safe environment where people can connect with themselves daily, express their feelings, and practice emotional awareness. Even a small moment of self-reflection each day can bring more clarity, peace, and strength to one's inner world.

The idea was born out of a shared desire to encourage emotional awareness and provide subtle, supportive tools to help users check in with themselves daily.
